about_the_game:
"The Last City" is an immersive and challenging survival and strategy game that plunges players into the unforgiving depths of a vast desert. In this gripping adventure, you will take on the role of a leader, tasked with guiding a group of resilient colonists through the harsh and inhospitable desert terrain. The ultimate goal is to establish and maintain a flourishing colony that can withstand the challenging conditions for a minimum of 10 days.

Key Features
  • Survival and Strategy: Navigate a challenging desert environment, making strategic decisions to ensure your colony's survival.
  • Resource Gathering: Explore the desert to collect vital resources like food, water, wood, and minerals.
  • Building and Crafting: Construct various buildings and craft tools and equipment essential for your colony's prosperity.
  • Colonist Management: Manage colonist attributes, work schedules, and happiness to optimize productivity.
  • Tech Tree: Research new technologies and upgrades to advance your colony's capabilities.
  • Day/Night Cycle: Experience dynamic day and night cycles, influencing gameplay and challenges.
  • Combat and Defense: Equip colonists to defend against threats and hostile entities.
  • Event System: Encounter random events that impact your colony's progress and strategy.
  • Automation: Establish factories to automate item production and resource processing.
  • Save/Load System: Easily save and load your progress to experiment with different approaches.
